name: Gridded Bangle (Available in Ruby!)
description:
Stack 'em, or wear it solo for a maximum effect-- This large Bangle features rows of hand-set, faceted gems and a lock closure for easy wear. Available in vivid Rubies or Sapphires.

Measurement: Inside Diameter- 2.25 inches. Width: 5/8 inch.

Metal: Rhodium Plated Sterling Silver

Click on numbers to see other images.

name: Azure Bangle
description:
Wear this piece alone or layer it with other arm candy- either way this piece will add lots of glamour! The bangle is encrusted with hand-set, faceted Blue Zircons and features a lock that allows you to easily put on or take off.  

Measurement: Inside diameter- 2.25 inches. Width- 0.75 inch.

Metal: Rhodium-Plated Sterling Silver

Click on numbers to see other images.

name: Smoky Quartz Link Necklace
description:
A sophisticated everyday necklace featuring faceted Smoky Quartz, oval links, and a Lobster Clasp closure. Layer it with other necklaces from your jewelry box for a beautiful, eclectic finish.

Measurement: 31 inches long. Gems measure 5x7mm.

Metal: Rhodium-Plated Sterling Silver

Click on numbers to see other images.

name: Falcon Collar
description:
This vintage-inspired collar adds a little glamourous edge to any outfit. You can wear it with a fancy dress or, our favorite way, with a printed T-shirt and jeans.  It features rows of marquise Ruby gems all around meeting an oval Ruby in the center and a Lock Closure.

Measurement: ~ 17 inches. Width- 0.50 inch

Metal: Rhodium-Plated Sterling Silver

Click on numbers to see other images.

name: Ruby Star Earrings
description:
Add a timeless elegance with this stunning button earring, which features hand-set, faceted rubies and cubic zirconia. Clip Post closure.

Measurement: 1 inch diameter

Metal: Rhodium-Plated Sterling Silver
